verbs.description: [ARG1: illegal pill mill] [V: busted] [ARGM-LOC: in northwest oklahoma city] hazmat crews were on the scene of an illegal pill mill bust in the northwest side it happened around 1 30 a m on friday at a business near britton road and broadway extension rockwell northwest expressway facetiming tammie beal marijuana rockwell and memorial hydrocodone oklahoma city police department ude gary knight mill ude realty universal development enterprise oklahoma farmer insurance oklahoma city pill
